tooltips.arr: Annual Recurring Revenue. Total subscription revenue normalized to a 12-month period.
tooltips.mrr: Monthly Recurring Revenue. Subscription revenue for the current month.
tooltips.netNewArr: New + Expansion – Contraction – Churn for the selected period.
tooltips.nrr: Net Revenue Retention = (Ending ARR + Churn + Contraction) ÷ Starting ARR.
tooltips.churn: Percentage of revenue lost to cancellations/downgrades during the period.
tooltips.signups: New accounts created in the selected period.
tooltips.activation: Percent of new accounts reaching key onboarding milestones.
tooltips.winRate: Closed-won opportunities ÷ total opportunities within the period.
tooltips.salesCycleDays: Average number of days from opportunity creation to close-won.
tooltips.dau: Daily Active Users – unique users who engaged with core actions today.
tooltips.mau: Monthly Active Users – unique users active in the last 30 days.
tooltips.stickiness: DAU ÷ MAU. Higher means users return more frequently.

activationFunnel.title: Activation Funnel
activationFunnel.tooltip: Drop-offs from signups to PQLs/SQLs/Won for the period.

cohortRetention.title: Cohort Retention
cohortRetention.tooltip: Share of accounts active by months since signup (rows are cohorts).

charts.mrr12mTooltip: Monthly Recurring Revenue trend for the last 12 months.
charts.dauWindowTooltip: Daily Active Users over the last {{days}} days.
